meanings.definition: A tool used for gripping and turning nuts, bolts, pipes, etc.
meanings.sent1: My dad always carries a wrench in his toolbox.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic reached for a wrench to fix the car.
meanings.sent3: In the cartoon, the character mistakenly used a wrench to eat soup.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like a wrench, tightening around his heart.
meanings.sent5: The shiny wrench gleamed under the garage lights.

meanings.sent1: She wrenches open the stubborn jar lid.
meanings.sent2: He wrenches the door open after it got stuck.
meanings.sent3: The magician tried to wrench a rabbit out of his hat but failed comically.
meanings.sent4: The news of the accident wrenches at my heart.
meanings.sent5: The storm wrenches the trees, bending them to its will.
